## Academic Position & Leadership

I'm an Professor at the Faculty of Medicine of the University of Porto (FMUP), with academic training in Health Sciences and Digital Health. I'm the Co-Director of the Master’s in Medical Informatics at FMUP and a member of RISE@Health – Health Research Network, within the thematic line on Digital Transformation, Artificial Intelligence, Data and Decision Sciences in Health.

I teach Medical Informatics, Digital Health and Respiratory Physiology across undergraduate, master’s and doctoral programmes.

My research focuses on the evaluation and validation of diagnostic and monitoring technologies in respiratory diseases, and on the application of artificial intelligence and clinical data analytics to medical decision-making. I also work on digital innovation and the development of mobile applications for clinical practice and chronic disease management.

My academic background spans Health Sciences and Digital Health, with specialized expertise in respiratory physiology, medical informatics, and health technology assessment.

## Research Focus

My research program centers on the intersection of clinical medicine, digital technologies, and data science, with particular emphasis on:

### Digital Health & Respiratory Medicine
- Evaluation and validation of diagnostic technologies for respiratory diseases
- Development and testing of monitoring devices for chronic respiratory conditions
- Assessment of point-of-care testing technologies in pulmonology
- Clinical validation of digital biomarkers for respiratory health

### Artificial Intelligence & Clinical Decision Support
- Machine learning applications in medical diagnosis and prognosis
- Clinical data analytics for evidence-based decision-making
- Predictive modeling for patient outcomes
- Integration of AI systems into clinical workflows

### Mobile Health & Digital Innovation
- Design and development of mobile health applications
- Patient-centered digital tools for chronic disease management
- Telemedicine and remote monitoring solutions
- User experience research in health technology

### Health Informatics & Data Science
- Electronic health records optimization
- Health data standards and interoperability
- Clinical information systems evaluation
- Big data analytics in healthcare

## Vision & Future Directions

I'm committed to advancing the field of digital health through:

- **Evidence-based innovation**: Ensuring new technologies are rigorously evaluated before clinical implementation
- **Interdisciplinary collaboration**: Bringing together clinicians, data scientists, engineers, and patients
- **Education excellence**: Preparing healthcare professionals for the digital age
- **Patient-centered design**: Keeping patient needs and outcomes at the center of technology development
- **Sustainable healthcare**: Leveraging digital tools to improve efficiency and accessibility of care
